overview:
## Discussion

The value of this property is `nil` unless the looper’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLooper/status-swift.property] changes to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLooper/Status-swift.enum/failed]. If this occurs, this property value contains an error object that provides the details of the error that prevented looping.

# error

**Instance Property**

An error that describes the reason looping failed.

## Declaration

```swift
var error: (any Error)? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is `nil` unless the looper’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLooper/status-swift.property] changes to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLooper/Status-swift.enum/failed]. If this occurs, this property value contains an error object that provides the details of the error that prevented looping.
title: error
